ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: Webhook call sending Parameters doesn't work
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? Hey there, since the last update the sending Parameters via web hook fails. 1. Create Webhook 2. Create parameters 3. Test webhook 4. Newly created parameters (after the update) are not attached to the web hook 5. Parameters created before the update are attached to the web hook ### Desired Behavior attach all Parameters. I think the issue is, that in the current version the check boxes are missing for the parameters. When you go on the headers tab, then the check boxes are still there. ### Project Details Node: **v16.20.1** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **true** RootDB: **pg** PackageVersion: **0.111.0** ### Attachments
